sans.$description: Primary sans-serif stack. Inter for friendly, approachable tone. Falls back to system fonts.

mono.$value: 'Fira Code', 'SF Mono', Monaco, 'Cascadia Code', 'Roboto Mono', Courier New, monospace
mono.$description: Monospace for code snippets, technical metadata. Optional for future use.

display.$description: Display / H1 - Hero statements, major headings. 56px base size.

h1.$description: Headline 1 - Main section titles. 40px base size.

h3.$description: Headline 3 - Card titles, problem titles. 24px base size.

h4.$description: Headline 4 - Small section headers. 20px base size.

body.$description: Body text - Conversational UI, chat messages, descriptions. 16px base size.

body-sm.$description: Small body text - Secondary info, timestamps. 14px base size.

label.$description: Labels - Chips, buttons, metadata, micro-copy. 12px base size.

regular.$description: Regular weight for body text, conversational content.

medium.$description: Medium weight for emphasis, buttons, labels.

semibold.$description: Semibold for subheadings, important UI elements.

normal.$description: Normal line height for body text, conversational content. 150% for readability.

relaxed.$description: Relaxed line height for longer text blocks. 175% for comfortable reading.

tight.$description: Tight letter spacing for large headings, display text.

normal.$description: Normal letter spacing for body text.

wide.$description: Wide letter spacing for labels, all-caps text, emphasis.
